serialization.name: Menu
serialization.description: Renders a drop-down menu in each row of a column using the jsx3.gui.Menu class. In the EXECUTE event, the CDF record id is available with this.emGetSession().recordId. Honors the @jsxdisabled and @jsxnomask CDF attributes.

strings.jsxxml: <data jsxid="jsxroot"> <record jsxid="1" jsxtext="One"/> <record jsxid="2" jsxtext="Two"/> <record jsxid="3" jsxtext="Three"/> </data>

events.jsxexecute: jsx3.log('Executed menu item ' + strRECORDID + ' in row ' + this.emGetSession().recordId + '.');
